data.Title: Google Ruled a Monopoly in US Antitrust Case
data.Description: A US federal judge ruled that Google has acted illegally to maintain a monopoly in online search. The ruling could have significant implications for the tech giant and the entire ad industry.

data.Title: Microsoft Bing Sees Opportunity After Google Antitrust Ruling
data.Description: Following the ruling that Google holds an illegal monopoly in search, Microsoft executives believe there is an opportunity for Bing to gain market share.

data.Title: Apple Rejected Bing as Safari's Default Search Engine
data.Description: Court documents from the Google antitrust case reveal that Apple refused to adopt Microsoft Bing as the default search engine for Safari, citing Bing's poor quality.

data.Title: Elon Musk's X Sues Advertisers for Alleged Antitrust Activity
data.Description: Elon Musk's X has filed a federal lawsuit against a group of advertisers, including CVS Health, Mars, and Unilever, alleging antitrust behavior related to their involvement with the Global Alliance for Responsible Media (GARM).

data.Title: Google Search Console Launches New Recommendations Feature
data.Description: Google Search Console is rolling out a new feature that provides website owners with personalized SEO recommendations based on data from their sites.

data.Title: Google Trends Gets a Redesign
data.Description: Google Trends has rolled out a new design for its trending now page, offering more filter options and keyword data.

data.Title: Google Business Profiles Tests "See Also" Carousel
data.Description: Google is testing a "see also" carousel on Google Business Profiles, potentially showing competitors' listings directly beneath a business's own listing.

data.Title: Google Ads Bug Served Ads for Competitors' Products
data.Description: Google has acknowledged a bug in Google Ads that caused ads to be served for products from other merchants' Google Merchant Center accounts. The company will issue credits to affected advertisers.

data.Title: Bing Search Algorithm Update Detected in May
data.Description: Data analysis suggests that Bing released a significant search algorithm update around May 29th, although Microsoft has denied any unusual releases around that time.

data.Title: Google Search Traffic Remains Strong Despite AI Competition
data.Description: Despite the emergence of new AI-powered search engines, Google's search traffic has continued to grow, according to a recent report.
